channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Radius PCV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Radius PCV

item.title: CVE-2023-39930|2024-09-17T14:16:56.734Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20radius%20pcv
item.description: A first-factor authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the PingFederate with PingID Radius PCV when a MSCHAP authentication request is sent via a maliciously crafted RADIUS client request.
